refnamediv.refpurpose: It finds that the given transfer function is of continuous domain type.

listitem.para: Transfer function or hyper matrix of the transfer functions

refsection.title: Description
refsection.para: output : The output is Boolean type. It returns "T"(True) when the model or the hyper matrix of the model is discrete domain type and return "F"(False) if the model is continuous domain type.

refsection.title: Examples
refsection.programlisting: s=poly(0,'s');H1=(1+2*s)/s^2;S1bis=syslin('c',H1) output = finddt(S1bis) z=poly(0,'z'); h=syslin(0.1,(1-2*z)/(z^2+0.3*z+1)) output = finddt(h)
